name: TVScoop
0:
”Alexa, ask T.V. Scoop what's the summary for the office?”
”what's the rating for narcos”
”what's the rating for legends of tomorrow”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. v. scoop
des:
This skill will quickly read a summary or rating for a TV show. Trigger the skill by asking "What is the summary for Girls?" or "What is the rating for Narcos?"

This skill uses the TV Maze API (http://www.tvmaze.com/api)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
